transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello? Haan ji.
Customer: Haan namaskar sir.
Executive: Namaskar ji.
Customer: Sir Ashok baat kar raha hun main na aap India Mart se baat kar rahe ho sir?
Executive: Ji bataiye.
Customer: Sir main ye keh raha hun ki sir na India Mart ki application hoti hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Hello? Ji ji bataiye.
Customer: To aap meri baat sun pa rahe ho na?
Executive: Haan main sun pa raha hun bataiye.
Customer: Main keh raha hun sir India Mart ki app hoti hai mere do phone me chal rahi hai sir ek phone me band kara dijiye sir.
Executive: Ek band karani hai?
Customer: Haan matlab meri app na do phone me chal rahi hai sir ek ladke ne jaise na jaise note bhi deta hun na.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Ek sal ke ladke me khulwa rakhi thi wo band karani hai sir kaise band hogi?
Executive: Uh aap apni company ka naam ek bar bataiye mujhe.
Customer: Niraj Class India GRC.
Executive: Apna registered number bataiye pehle aap.
Customer: Registered number ye wala hai sir?
Executive: Bataiye ek bar.
Customer: 98 98 13 13 87 87 86 86 83 83
Executive: Theek hai. Bas aap mujhe panch saat minute ka time dijiye main aapko call back karke isko karwa deta hun.
Customer: Haan dusre number chal rahi hai wo band kara dena double one hai piche usme theek hai.
Executive: Haan main abhi call kar raha hun aapko panch saat minute baad theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai sir theek hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to close IndiaMART app on one phone.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for company name and registered number.

- Executive assured a callback in 5-7 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 5-7 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- app, registered number, company name, callback
